name: MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle
desc: A value that specifies a style for the outside of the text.

items.name: case undefined
items.desc: An edge style has not been specified.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The text should not have a styled edge.

items.name: case raised
items.desc: An edge makes the text appear to rise above the background.

items.name: case depressed
items.desc: An edge makes the text appear pushed in.

items.name: case uniform
items.desc: A thin outline lies along the edge of the text.

items.name: case dropShadow
items.desc: An edge makes the text appear to float above the background.
